message.body: Thanks for coming to visit! It was lovely to finally meet you and get to enjoy your company! Let us know when you're coming to LA next - who knows we may be in a fit state to see you!
Ok great! I'll let you know for sure. FYI, I sent a little something to the house and I think it should be arriving Saturday. Thanks again for everything!
Thanks ##### Yes do let us know, even if it's just so we can hook you and your lady up with the more sociable less baby occupied world around us :)
Great! You guys are the best. Give jam and sof a sneaky hug for me.
